quote: ''Freedom to information will serve as the antidote to the plague of corruption, it would ensure transparency in government transactions. The public has the right to know what is going on behind the walls of Malacañang and other government offices.''
''(A)ng importante dito, isa-isa o dalawa-dalawa lang, hindi 'yung lima-lima. 'Ba hindi naman basketball team. Wala na bang ibang hanap-buhay sa Pilipinas? Wala na bang ibang pagkakakitaan?''

''It's so easy to play into the crowd. It's so easy to be populist and say let's put it at zero. Where do you end? Where do you end this spiral of, what do you want to bring down, 10 percent? Bring it to zero. Let's just cut the debate all the way to the end. But that's not being responsible. That's not part of good governance. I think the issue is do we bring down taxes or not. I think that as a fundamental belief, the money belongs to the pocket of the people who work for it and who earned it.''
-Interview at TV5 during 'Happy Hour' segment, Oct. 26, 2015
''For the first time after a long, long time, we are faced with an agreement that could bring about lasting peace in Mindanao.''
''Ang para sa Pilipinas ay dapat manatili sa kamay ng Pilipino. Dedepensahan natin ang atin.''
''I don't think that our Constitution is our weakest link. It's not our stumbling block to economic growth.''

''Ang respeto at karapatan na ipinaglalaban ng ating LGBT community ay kabahagi ng laban ng sambayanang Pilipino. Lahat tayo ay may karapatang mabigayan ng nararapat na serbisyo at pagkakataong umasenso. Dapat walang maiwan sa pag-abot ng ating kolektibong pangarap. Ito ang nasa sentro ng Daang Matuwid: ang pagbibigay dangal sa bawat Pilipino na walang pinipili, walang diskriminasyon, at walang panghuhusga.''
''Papatibayin natin 'yan, dedepensahan natin 'yan, papalawakin natin 'yan, at sisiguraduhin natin na makakapag-graduate nga lahat itong mga anak natin na natutulungan ngayon ng 4Ps.''

''Of course, ipapatupad natin ang batas, may batas, may mga reglamento tungkol sa regular na trabaho at maasahan na ipapatupad natin ito. Doon naman sa regular na mga trabaho na araw-araw na yun ang ginagawa ay dapat naman maging regular sila... maasahan na ipapatupad natin ang batas dito sa mga trabahador ng mga kababayan natin para hindi sila pagsamantalahan.''

''Hindi, hindi ako payag... I'm one of the 40 percent na hindi payag. Para sa akin ang pamilya ang sentro ng buhay ng bawat tao,'di ba? So dapat gawin nating lahat na manatiling matatag ang pamilya, paniwala ko rin na ang katatagan ng ating bansa.''
''Mamuhay tayo ng marangal dahil hindi na po natin kailangan mangibang-bansa pa para lamang magkaroon ng hanapbuhay. Dito lang po sa ating bansa.''

''The party position is they should all face investigation. Dapat lamang dahil pera ng tao ito at hindi dapat nawawalang-hiya ang pera ng tao. It is clear among (Liberal) party members that we are pursuing 'Tuwid na Daan.' The party will not be used to hide the truth.''

''Bilang public policy para sa akin ay hindi ako pabor dito. Subalit... may mga kamag-anak ako na close na close na have partners and nirerespeto ko sila, minamahal ko sila, tinatanggap ko sila, bukas-puso, bukas-loob kong ang aking pagtrato sa kanila.''

''Hindi na natin maaaring gawing kapital yung 10 years na education program natin, kasi mahusay man iyan ay may extra two years yung iba. Kaya kailangan makahabol tayo. Kung hindi, ang mga trabaho ay hindi pupunta dito sa atin at pupunta sa ibang bansa.''

QUALIFIED YES
''Yes, if the question is do we distribute the 700,000 undistributed? Yes. But hindi d'yan nagtatapos ang usapin tungkol sa kahirapan at sa pagsasaka. Dahil kahit na-distribute mo lahat 'yan, hindi pa rin magiging maunlad, hindi pa rin magiging maginhawa ang kabuhayan ng mga magsasaka dahil hindi sila magkakaroon ng efficient at profitable na operation.''
''We support it (localized peace talks). We are always for peace. There will be no development without peace. If laws will not prevail, how can we improve.''

''These funds are being given out equally to the mayors and governors regardless of their political affiliation based on the proposals they and people's organizations had proposed to combat poverty in their communities. This only becomes an issue because some people want to see evil in the implementation of this program.''
